# core-toggle

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `alt`      | `alt`      | If applied, the element is rendered with the alternate styling. Use: `"alt"`.                                                                                                                                                                                  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | If applied, the element is checked. Use: `"checked"`.                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `color`    | `color`    | Optional primary color of the icon. Defaults to `blue`. Use the following `@color` in [core-primitives](https://unpkg.com/@core-ds/primitives/core-primitives.less) without `@color-`. Use: `color="green"`, `color="yellow"`, `color="red"`, `color="black"`. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If applied, the user cannot interact with the element. Use: `"disabled"`.                                                                                                                                                                                      | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `large`    | `large`    | Apply the large pre-defined large toggle size styling. Use: `"large"`.                                                                                                                                                                                         | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `required` | `required` | If applied, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form containing this element. Use: `"required"`.                                                                                                                                                 | `boolean` | `false`     |
